predicate.note: Frames file for 'sanction' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'approve'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` Today is not the time [0] [*] to signal that Congress in any way sanctions the dismal state into which antitrust enforcement has fallen [*T*-3] [*T*-2] , '' Mr. Edwards argued [0] [*T*-1] .

example.name: passive
example.text: Some forms of private property would be sanctioned [*-1] .
